item.title: [RESOLVED - ACCEPTED] Off topic board w/o post count
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Moparisthebest:

We had one before and it became spam central. What kind of things would you post in there?

What’s bad about spam central? Make the board hidden maybe. It’s not like people go in the off topic board expecting quality conversation, they know that it’s full of nonsense.

Read full topic
item.source: [RESOLVED - ACCEPTED] Off topic board w/o post count

item.title: [RESOLVED - ACCEPTED] Off topic board w/o post count
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Moparisthebest:

We had one before and it became spam central. What kind of things would you post in there?

Threads/Topics that would be considered spam and off topic to GD. You can probably see how many garbage posts get removed from their daily.

As to why I requested it to not have post count as well. I think it would clean up the overall trolling of the forums in general tbh.

Read full topic
